t: Delhi High Court: Amazon Fined Rs 339.25 Crore For Infringing On Beverly Hills Polo Club's Trademark
s: Amazon's India unit has been ordered by the Delhi High Court to pay Rs 339.25 crore to luxury clothing brand Beverly Hills Polo Club in damages for infringing on its trademark logo.

t: Nike to start selling its products directly on Amazon's US website again
